resources.string: Incomplete task will have no check mark on the right
Completed tasks will be marked as checked on the right
Press + button to add new To-Dos
Press trash Button to delete all completed To-Dos
On top right corner, there is 2 icons.
The left icon will take you to a screen where you can delete & reorder To-Dos and move To-Dos to other Tab
The right icon will take you to a screen where you can add & delete & edit & reorder Tabs
